A well has been constructed that is 2.0m Ø and 6.0m deep. Water is obtained for the use of school students. The well needs to be deepened further. A over head tank should be built and water should be pumped into it and distributed.

column5: A complete water project has been constructed, including water storage tank, a water treatment unit, a chlorination unit and a water pumping station. The water distribution pipeline system has been constructed and water connections have been provided to 60 houses. The project is not operational due to lack of electricity connection and placement of pumps.
